item.description:
There's nothing more romantic than ice skating right before Christmas. You see it in the movies all the time, there's always a romance that starts on the ice, and you know if they put it in the movies it's because it happens in real life.

Even if you don’t know how, that shouldn’t stop you from attending. In fact, if you’re a bit shaky on your feet, ice skating gives you the reason to touch each other in a fun and playful way. As you help each other get your bearings, you’ll need to hold onto each other's arms quite a bit while on the ice. Nothing makes for a better connection than constant touching and hand holding.

For those who know how to ice skate already, a more intimate night awaits you, as you'll be more easily find that special connection.

Our night starts at 5:30 when we meet up at the Frog Pond Café for a bite to eat. We'll get to the ticket window about 6:00-6:10, and skate until 8:00 or so. Then we'll wrap the night up with a warm hot cocoa back at the café.

DETAILS:

- 5:30 Meet at Frog Pond Café.
- 6:00-6:10 Head to the ticket booth.
- $5 admission, $9 skate rental.
- 6:10 Ice skating!
- 8:00 Back to the cafe for hot cocoa.
- 8:30-9:00 Wrap it up and head home.

Invited Groups:

Boston Singles | Social Fun | Beantown and Beyond
item.how_to_find_us: We'll meet at the Frog Pond Cafe at 5:30.
item.name: Singles: Winter Romance - Ice Skating at Frog Pond
